title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
OB: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") as a filter in a table, an error message appears on the report page. The error message states: 'There are error(s) in Table: table8. Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s)). Detail: An error happened in data type conversion. Can not convert it to Date. Can not convert it to Date.'
EB: The filter should work without errors. When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") as a filter in a table, no error message should appear on the report page.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the table filter.
3. Enter the value new Date("3/2/2005") in the filter.
4. Save and preview the report.
5. Verify that the filter works without any error messages.
